summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the provision of low income housing, conditionally authorizing acquisition and assignment of an option on real property for development of low income housing; conditionally authorizing negotiation of an agreement with a nonprofit housing organization for development and management of a low income housing project; accepting a grant from the State of Washington for the development of a low income housing project; and conditionally appropriating such funds and certain additional funds from the Cumulative Reserve Fund for such project.
